Only three letters, but the start of everything great.
"For" is a force that challenges the status quo.
"For" means, "We are going to the moon" instead of "Let's stay at home."
For in life with more wow and more now.
For more space and less waste.
For loving your city even more.
Being against something is the easy way,...
...but being for something is an attitude that can change the world.
